name: Painter Paper Texture File
summary: Learn about .PAPERS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Painter is an application that provides various features for creating realistic digital paintings and editing photographs. The app also includes paper textures for adding more realism to creations.
You can view a library of paper textures through the "Papers" panel in Painter. To access the papers, select Window → Media Panels → Papers.

instructions: While Corel replaced the PAPERS format, you can still open a PAPERS file with Corel Painter. For example, to open a PAPERS file, select Window → Media Panels → Papers, click the "Manage Libraries" icon, then select Import Legacy Paper Library.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
